description: This file is a React component for the front-end UI of a Tic Tac Toe game. It manages game state, handles user interactions, and composes other UI components such as Board and Controls.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: React component that renders the game interface, manages game state, and handles user interactions.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles a cell click by updating the game state with the new move.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.
